long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Scrap.io Maps Connect extension adds social networks and emails to Google Maps.

ğŸ‘‰ Turn every Google Maps search into a B2B lead goldmine, and contact companies with just one click. Access a complete list of business emails directly from your search on Google Maps.

ğŸ‘‰ Automatic information retrieval: as you navigate on Google Maps, the Scrap.io extension extracts emails and social media profiles of listed companies in real-time.

ğŸ‘‰ Prospect with one click: every link, phone number, or email address is clickable. With one click, you can make a call, send an email, or send a private message on social media.

ğŸ‘‰ Simplicity and Speed: The Scrap.io extension is specifically designed to integrate with Google Maps. Information is instantly available in all your Google Maps searches.

ğŸ‘‰ Turn Google Maps into a Lead Generator: every search becomes a business opportunity and lets you tap into a vast B2B database.

ğŸ‘‰ Optimize your time: With the Scrap.io extension, you'll significantly reduce your lead search and prospecting time, so you can focus on building business relationships and sales.

ğŸ‘‰ Here are the data that will enrich your searches: website, email(s), phone(s), contact page(s), Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube... Various ways to contact your prospects with one click.

ğŸ“ Turn your Google Maps lead search into a simple, fast, and intuitive experience.

Install the Scrap.io Maps Connect extension today and discover how it can revolutionize your approach to prospecting and business development.

-------------------------------------------

This Chrome extension is offered by Scrap.io, an online application that allows scraping Google Maps and extracting emails from company websites.

If you're looking for a Google Maps scraping solution, the Scrap.io platform is the ideal solution for creating lists of local business prospects: restaurants, shops, contractors and other small and medium-sized enterprises on Google Maps.
